assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Atypical_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_Initial_First_Presentation_of_Recurrent_Q13
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: k) Cobalamin C deficiency mediated TMA: provide MCV, and if indicated serum homocysteine and methionine levels, and urine 24 hour homocysteine and methylmalonic acid levels
